WELCOME: Welcome to your transaction! i'm the demo application of your talk at devoxx morocco. Now, how can i help you ?
REPROMPT: I'm still waiting for your question.
HELP: You can ask questions such as, remember me to do something, how can i help you ?
ON_SUCCESS: Your transaction has been successfully processed. Thank you.
TECHNICAL_ERROR: Sorry, something was wrong in the server. can repeat ask me again ?
SLOT_NOT_FOUNDED: I'm sorry, i currently do not know. can you repeat your question in other words ?
